field.name: uids
field.query: SELECT u.id , u.name FROM #__users as u inner join #__user_usergroup_map AS ugm ON ugm.user_id = u.id where ugm.group_id > 2 ORDER by ugm.group_id DESC, u.name
field.label: MOD_JUNEWS_FIELD_USERSID_LABEL
